title: Great 2 BR downstairs condo with a Community pool in the Northeast!
map_address: 4730 E. Craig Rd. #1126 near Craig and Lamb
posting_body: ['Great 2 bed/2 bath downstairs condo unit in the Northeast!', '974 sq.', 'ft. One covered parking space.', 'Large front living room with a gas fireplace!', 'Dining area off of kitchen.', 'Kitchen has a pantry!', 'Ceiling fans!', 'Laundry closet.', 'Master bedroom has a walk-in closet.', 'Has a patio!', 'Located in a gated community with a community pool, spa, playground, clubhouse, and exercise room!!', 'No Section 8.', 'All appliances included!', 'Pets allowed.', 'No smoking.', 'For more information on this property or to set up an appointment to view it, please call Chris at', 'show contact info', '.', 'Please reference the street name 4730 E. CRAIG RD.', '#1126 when calling!', '~First United Management Group, LLC.~', 'Located at Craig and Lamb.', 'License # S.0169212']
